brewery.brewery_description:
SURE.
Our creative outlet.
We brew the beer we love to drink, with music we love to listen to.
Honestly, we dont have a brewery but our mates do.
Our recipes never cut corners or skimp on ingredients
We can taste the difference and so can you.

beer.beer_description:
Imperial N.Z Pilsner dialled up to Xmas with sacks of Kiwi hops.
Welcome to your new festive alibi.
It could even get you out of helping with the dishes.*
*terms and conditions may apply

user.bio: Beer is the word. Now you know this, you can thank a yellow fuzz from Canberra for this.

items.badge_description: When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 320 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 65!

beer.beer_description:
Terpenes are natural organic compounds which give plants their distinctive aroma. 
Like the loads of dank resinous hops we used in this IPA. We then supercharged it with extra terpenes, just to make SURE.
 Fear can hold you prisoner. Hops can set you free.

Citra - Strata - Mosaic

Took my chances on a big jet plane.

Never let 'em tell you that they're all the same.

Oh, the sea was red, and the sky was grey.

Wondered how tomorrow could ever follow today.

The mountains and the canyons start to tremble and shake.

The children of the sun began to awake.

items.badge_description: You’ve unlocked today’s Recappd badge! Any drink you check in helps power your faction as we race toward choosing the next Untappd icon. Explore your year in beer at Recappd and come back tomorrow! Recappd is presented by Crescent Canna: Try the bestselling THC drinks in the country and get FREE THC gummies with your purchase. Add any THC drink to your cart and use code: GUMTAPPD. Shop Now >
Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 6 years on Untappd!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 5 states or countries.

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 5 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 2!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 10 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment:
Carwyn Canvent 2025 #19:
Went down way too fast. Bursts of lemon, almost wheaty. Bubbly mouthfeel. Dry and crisp finish. Real good stuff.

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 330 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 67!

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 45 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 10! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description:
Citra - Strata - Mosaic

Took my chances on a big jet plane.

Never let 'em tell you that they're all the same.

Oh, the sea was red, and the sky was grey.

Wondered how tomorrow could ever follow today.

The mountains and the canyons start to tremble and shake.

The children of the sun began to awake.

Ring the Alarm, it's Ba Ba BOOM time.
Super lean malt system. Bass-heavy hops.
An ode to our favourite anthems.
Scan the can for your SURE SOUNDS playlist 
Play it loud? 
SURE.

Hops: Citra, Chinook, Strata

Malts: Low Colour Maris Otter, Pale Wheat

Kickstart your heart with juicy riffs of Strata, Citra & El Dorado hops. Turn it up to 11. Shout at the Devil. Scream over the crowd. Dance in the neon red glow.

Malt: Best Red X

Hops: Citra, Strata, El Dorado

beer.beer_name: All I Want For Xmas Is True
beer.beer_description:
Imperial N.Z Pilsner dialled up to Xmas with sacks of Kiwi hops.
Welcome to your new festive alibi.
It could even get you out of helping with the dishes.*
*terms and conditions may apply
SURE 100% DYNAMIGHT meets DUNCANS Yum Yum Yuzu. A fruity, hoppy love child.

Lime.
Grapefruit. 
Love. 
Pinch of Salt. 
100% REFRESHMENT.

Terpenes are natural organic compounds which give plants their distinctive aroma. 
Like the loads of dank resinous hops we used in this IPA. We then supercharged it with extra terpenes, just to make SURE.
 Fear can hold you prisoner. Hops can set you free.

Biggie, biggie, biggie…
A SURE nod to the big, bold,
silky-smooth “golden age” of Hip Hop.
Malt complexity in perfect free flow? 
SURE

Here it comes. 
B R O A D E R  than Broadway. 
Resinous, citrus. HUGE bass thunder.
Dial it up to 200?  - SURE.

Hops: Citra, Strata, Galaxy, Vic Secret
Malts: Golden Promise, Carapils, Vienna
IBU: 62

Like diving headfirst into a cool, crisp ocean,
scented with waves of "juicy as" Kiwi hops. 
Drift onto the can's QR code for your SURE SOUNDS playlist. 
Summer holiday all year round? 
SURE.

Hops: Nelson Sauvin, Motueka, Enigma

Malts: Pilsner, Carapils, Flaked Wheat

Hops: Sauvin, Riwaka, Kohatu
Malts: Vic Pale, Dexter, Pale Wheat
Like taking a flying fox through a Kiwi hop field. Tropical fruit fireworks & Citrus high fives. Sippin’ Sunshine? FOR SURE.

A dependable hoppy Pale ale brewed for our SURE friends the Rieger family.
You know, those solid mates that are always there when you need them. 
Just like this reliable balanced Pale.
Great beer, great mates - ALWAYS x
West Coast IPA that is a collaboration with  Brewtal and brewed for The Catfish's birthday.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY to the CATFISH in Fitzroy! 
Deliciously dank, brewed with King Louis XIII terpenes. When it pours, it reigns.

Citrus & Sunshine. Long summer days, belly laughs with mates. Drinking beers in the sun to your favourite song. Perfect in every way.

Brewed with our friends at Craft Wine Store.
